resources.string: In the sixth tutorial you learn how to use bombs.
This is the sixth tutorial. Here you will learn how to use bombs to destroy walls or to harm enemies.
On the right side is a knight who wants to stop you. HOLD (do not tap!) the button on the right side to release a magic bolt. You will need two hits to kill him.
Congratulations you learned how to use your bolt
Now reach the flag to finish this tutorial
Use the pull down menu to change the weapon.
Now plant a bomb next to the damaged bricks. Tap the attack button to place the bomb in front of you, hold the button to throw the bomb.
